price: Sεdeε wͻ’annye anni deε edikan no, Yε’bεdane wͻn akoma ne wͻn ani (afri ͻkwan tenenee no so) na Y’agyae wͻn wͻ wͻn yera no mu ama wͻn akeka akͻ (sε anifirafoͻ).
arabic: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفۡـِٔدَتَهُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ كَمَا لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ وَنَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wanuqallibu afidatahum wa-abṣārahum kamā lam yu'minū bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
